posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF T206 Seymour Throwing Rare Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking for any Blank Backs.. Drum... Black Lenox... Red Hindu

But only for the seymour throwing pose.

with the exception of the red hindu.. I know they exist... just a matter of finding the owners  :)

email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have one or know someone that does

Thanks
Jamie
